pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Ranking Project: Visualizations for Comparing Populations // Functions to generate plots and tables for comparing independently- sampled populations. Companion package to "A Primer on Visualizations for Comparing Populations, Including the Issue of Overlapping Confidence Intervals" by Wright, Klein, and Wieczorek (2019) DOI:10.1080/00031305.2017.1392359 and "A Joint Confidence Region for an Overall Ranking of Populations" by Klein, Wright, and Wieczorek (2020) DOI:10.1111/rssc.12402.
